TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .

CARDINAL . The applicant worked as a prosecutor . On DATE he was charged with bribe - taking and on CARDINAL DATE ORG found him guilty and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment . By a final judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG acquitted him and ordered his immediate release : he claimed to have been released DATE . The overall period of his detention amounted to DATE .
CARDINAL . The applicant brought an action against ORG and his employer seeking payment of compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage arising from his unlawful prosecution and detention .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ruled in his favour and stated that there had been a violation of his right to liberty . The court awarded him CARDINAL Moldovan lei ( MDL , the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) at the time ) in compensation for pecuniary damage and MDL MONEY ( EUR CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation for non - pecuniary damage . The defendants appealed .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG partially upheld the appeal , reduced the award of compensation for pecuniary damage to MDL CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL ( EUR CARDINAL at the time ) and awarded another MONEY ( ORG , the equivalent of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL at the time ) and MONEY ( ORG ) in respect of costs and expenses incurred during the proceedings . ORG upheld the award of compensation for non - pecuniary damage . The defendants lodged an appeal in cassation .

CARDINAL . By a final judgment of DATE ORG partially upheld the appeal in cassation and reduced the award of compensation for non - pecuniary damage to MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Prosecutor General lodged with ORG a request for annulment of the above - mentioned judgments and for a reduction in the amount of damages .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld ORG request for annulment and quashed the above - mentioned judgments . ORG adopted a new judgment and reduced the award of compensation for non - pecuniary damage to MDL CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) . It also ordered the re - opening of the proceedings in respect of the amount of compensation for pecuniary damage . On DATE the applicant received MDL CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . Following the re - opening of the proceedings , on DATE ORG ruled in favour of the applicant and awarded him ORG at the time ) in respect of pecuniary damage . The remainder of the judgment provided the same as the judgment of ORG of DATE . On DATE the judgment was enforced .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law was set out in PERSON v. GPE , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE .
